data.title: ALL THOSE TOMORROWS: AUTOBIOGRAPHY
data.meta_description:
Read 3 reviews from the world’s largest community 
    for readers. From a rambling farmhouse in the Midi region of France, Mai Zetterling, stage and screen act…
data.text: From a rambling farmhouse in the Midi region of France, Mai Zetterling, stage and screen actress turned film-maker and author, embarks on a journey - at once magical, moving, hilarious and incredible - through her richly varied life. From her childhood in Sweden, to Hoolywood and beyond; Mai takes us through each stage of her life with uncompromising honest and self-awareness. She describes her relationship with her children ('I was a no good mother'), her two husbands ('I have been ruled by love all my life and I know that marriage is not the answer') and her lovers, including Herbert Lom, Peter Finch - and Tyrone Power, with whom she had a much publicised and passionate affair.
